metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6612 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The (1) UpdateRequestHandler for XSLT or (2) XPathEntityProcessor in Apache Solr before 4.1 allows remote attackers to have an unspecified impact via XML data containing an external entity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue, different vectors than CVE-2013-6407.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6612` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblucene3-contrib-java - 3.6.2+dfsg-2
liblucene3-java - 3.6.2+dfsg-2
libsolr-java - 3.6.2+dfsg-2
solr-common - 3.6.2+dfsg-2
solr-jetty - 3.6.2+dfsg-2
solr-tomcat - 3.6.2+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.2+dfsg-2').
